channel.title: Str Bonus..?
channel.description: Hey how do i fix my hits.. The hits go by the str bonus, and attack bonus, and their level. Now 99 attack, and 99 str, hits cool. When i get 99 str, and 60 attack, or 70 attack. It hits max like 15... I know on rs that the hits go by str bonus, str level and attack level.. Jus how can i fix this?

item.title: Str Bonus..?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Hey how do i fix my hits… The hits go by the str bonus, and attack bonus, and their level. Now 99 attack, and 99 str, hits cool. When i get 99 str, and 60 attack, or 70 attack. It hits max like 15… I know on rs that the hits go by str bonus, str level and attack level… Jus how can i fix this?
